sources.title: Beast Of Yucca Flats
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: The Beast Of Yucca Flats (1961)
sources.description: A scientist is caught in a nuclear blast and is turned into a homicidal maniac. Essentially a silent film with narration.

sources.title: Beast of Yucca Flats
sources.description: Tor Johnson is a defecting Russian scientist who is transformed into a deranged caveman by the detonation of an atomic bomb. The IMDB entry is here .

sources.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats (1961)
sources.description: A refugee Soviet scientist arrives at a desert airport carrying secret documents, but is attacked by a pair of KGB assassins  and escapes into the desert, where he comes in range of an American nuclear test and is transformed into a mindless killing beast. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-beast-of-yucca-flats-1961/

sources.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats (1961) TOR JOHNSON
sources.description:
Stars: Tor Johnson as The Beast
Co-stars: Douglas Mellor, Barbara Francis, Bing Stafford 
Director/Writer: Coleman Francis

After a defecting Soviet scientist is hit by a nuclear explosion near Yucca Flats, he roams the area as a beast!

sources.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats (1961) Censored | Commies made him an atomic mutant!
sources.description:
When a defecting Soviet scientist, Joseph Javorsky (Tor Johnson), gets caught in a nuclear blast, he mutates into a mindless monster and rampages across the desert with fists of fury and a grudge against mankind. Hot on his radioactive trail, a pair of determined detectives must stop the Beast of Yucca Flats before his next meltdown turns the Mojave into mayhem.

Also known as: The Atomic Monster / Girl Madness  / The Violent Sun 

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/BNgDFxKU4xI

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/_A50FTVfIlM


Director + Writer: Coleman Francis
Actors: Douglas Mellor, Barbara Francis, Bing Stafford, & Tor Johnson 
Genre: Horror, Sci-Fi, B-movie
Released date: March 3, 1961
Filming Location: Yucca Flats, Nevada

metadata.Plot: A defecting Russian scientist is transformed by an atomic test into a hulking monster (Tor Johnson, of course). Not much else except some people are killed, boys get lost, and a rabbit sniffs Tor's corpse. This film was used for Mystery Science Theater 3000.
metadata.Actors: Douglas Mellor, Barbara Francis, Bing Stafford
